description: A basic wrapper around some Microsoft Sql Server views: sys and INFORMATION_SCHEMA.
releaseNotes:
* Some Information Schema tables are not complete.
* Only a basic subset of sys tables are implemented (geared toward and for use of the T4 framework to auto-generate Db-First class methods).
* Some column types are excluded, such as varbinary and sqlvariant.
* Uses System.Data and requires a standard Sql Server connection string.
* Tables are feteched individually into DataTables, not as part of a DataSet (Possible future ToDo item).
* x.ToList == List<Table> only available after initial fetch.
* Insert/Update/Delete methods are OBVIOUSLY not implemented. Select methods only, and the Query itself can be accessed from each individual table's methods.
summary: A basic wrapper around some Microsoft Sql Server views: sys and INFORMATION_SCHEMA.
title: MSSqlServerSysInfoSchema
